title: Macera Taller Bar
knownFor: House-infused spirits and artisanal cocktails at affordable prices
description: An industrial-chic 'workshop' bar where spirits are macerated on-site with fresh fruits and spices. Eschewing big brands for craft quality, it offers a unique menu of house-made gins, whiskies, and rums in a lively, modern atmosphere. Popular for its high-end cocktails at a fixed, budget-friendly price point.
